title: Spacious Radziwie Apartment with Fitness Center and Pet-Friendly Courtyard
description: Step into this bright, modern 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment boasting 87 sqm of thoughtfully designed living space. The open-concept kitchen and living area leads directly to a private balcony, perfect for morning coffee or evening relaxation. Smart layout, ample storage, and contemporary finishes offer a hassle-free city living experience tailored for comfort.
neighborhood_description: Located in Plock’s rapidly evolving Radziwie neighborhood, this apartment strikes the perfect balance between city life and peaceful retreat. Residents enjoy a pet-friendly atmosphere, green spaces, and quick access to a well-connected public transport network and major highways—ideal for an active urban lifestyle. Every amenity for daily convenience is just within reach, offering a serene oasis minutes from the city center.
target_buyer: Ideal for young professionals or small families with pets seeking a modern home with access to amenities, comfort, and community in a balanced suburban/urban environment.
market_positioning: Represents excellent value for buyers who want more space, amenities, and a lifestyle-forward location rivaling central Plock, yet at a more accessible price than city-core alternatives.
